h3.div: Weâre all in this together. We know that information can change quickly.
Please check in regularly with our official Facebook Pages, join us on Remind and check in with the school websites to stay up to date.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-wNfPc pSzOP-AhqUyc-wNfPc jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-wNfPc pSzOP-AhqUyc-qWD73c jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h3.div: Due to Illinoisâ Stay-at-Home Order, the 2020 CHS Senior Banquet has been cancelled. Our seniors will still be recognized for their academic and civic accomplishments.

div.p: We would like to offer our sincere gratitude to the scholarship grantors and their continued support of our students.
The 2020 CHS graduation date, time and format has yet to be finalized. Those details will be communicated through the district website and social media outlets.

div.p: Welcome to Christopher Unit School District No. 99. It is our pleasure to provide the best educational opportunities to our students and community all within a safe environment that is conducive to learning.

hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.small: The District is committed to ensuring accessibility of its website for students, parents, and members of the community with disabilities. All pages on the District's website will conform to the W3C WAI's Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.0, Level AA conformance, or updated equivalents.

Under District developed administrative procedures, students, parents, and members of the public may present a complaint regarding a violation of the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA), Section 504 related to the accessibility of any official District web presence which is developed by, maintained by, or offered through the District or third party vendors and open sources.

p.a: Click here for our ADA Policies and Procedures. Link will open in a new window.
